solution_line_template: There are {initial_cars} - {cars_left} = <<{initial_cars}-{cars_left}={cars_after_leaving}>>{cars_after_leaving} cars in the parking lot after {cars_left} went out.
{cars_left} + {more_cars_than_left} = <<{cars_left}+{more_cars_than_left}={cars_entered}>>{cars_entered} cars went in the parking lot at lunchtime.
So, there are {cars_after_leaving} + {cars_entered} = <<{cars_after_leaving}+{cars_entered}={final_cars}>>{final_cars} cars in the parking lot now.
